languages.text: "Твои амбиции стоили риска, тебе просто не повезло с учениками. Слабым суждено быть ступенями для других на пути к знаниям — прими эту жертву и живи без сожалений".

traits.locale_text: "Твои амбиции стоили риска, тебе просто не повезло с хором. Слабым порой суждено стать ступенькой для других на пути к к опыту и знаниям — прими эту жертву и живи без сожалений".

languages.text: "Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."
languages.original_text: "Твои амбиции стоили риска, тебе просто не повезло с учениками. Слабым суждено быть ступенями для других на пути к знаниям — прими эту жертву и живи без сожалений".

"Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."

languages.text: «Su ambición es meritoria, pero tuvo mala suerte con sus alumnos. Los débiles están destinados a allanar el camino del conocimiento para que otros lo recorran; acepte su sacrificio y viva sin arrepentirse de nada».
languages.original_text: "Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."

traits.locale_text: «Su ambición es meritoria, pero tuvo mala suerte con sus alumnos. Los débiles están destinados a allanar el camino del conocimiento para que otros lo recorran; acepte su sacrificio y viva sin arrepentirse de nada».

languages.text: 「あなたの野心は危険を冒す価値があった。ただ、あなたの教え子に関しては運が悪かっただけだ。弱者は、知識への道を歩む他の者たちの踏み台となる運命にある。この犠牲を受け入れ、後悔のないように生きなさい」
languages.original_text: "Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの野心は危険を冒す価値があった。ただ、あなたの教え子に関しては運が悪かっただけだ。弱者は、知識への道を歩む他の者たちの踏み台となる運命にある。この犠牲を受け入れ、後悔のないように生きなさい」

languages.text: “你很有抱负，你的抱负也值得你冒这个险，只是你在收学徒这方面运气不太好。弱者注定会成为他人攀登知识高峰路上的垫脚石。接受这样的牺牲，无悔无憾地活下去吧。”
languages.original_text: "Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."

traits.locale_text: “你很有抱负，你的抱负也值得你冒这个险，只是你在收学徒这方面运气不太好。弱者注定会成为他人攀登知识高峰路上的垫脚石。接受这样的牺牲，无悔无憾地活下去吧。”

languages.text: "Euer Ehrgeiz war das Risiko wert. Ihr hattet einfach kein Glück mit Euren Schülern. Die Schwachen dienen anderen als Trittsteine auf dem Pfad des Wissens ... akzeptiert dieses Opfer und lebt ohne Reue."
languages.original_text: "Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Ehrgeiz war das Risiko wert. Ihr hattet einfach kein Glück mit Euren Schülern. Die Schwachen dienen anderen als Trittsteine auf dem Pfad des Wissens ... akzeptiert dieses Opfer und lebt ohne Reue."

languages.text: « Vous aviez suffisamment d'ambition pour prendre le risque. Vous n'avez pas eu de chance avec vos disciples, voilà tout. Les faibles servent uniquement à paver le chemin de la connaissance pour les forts. Acceptez ce sacrifice, et cessez d'en éprouver des regrets. »
languages.original_text: "Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."

traits.locale_text: « Vous aviez suffisamment d'ambition pour prendre le risque. Vous n'avez pas eu de chance avec vos disciples, voilà tout. Les faibles servent uniquement à paver le chemin de la connaissance pour les forts. Acceptez ce sacrifice, et cessez d'en éprouver des regrets. »

languages.text: "Hırsın bu riski almaya değermiş. Yalnızca öğrencilerinden yana şansın yaver gitmemiş. İrfana uzanan yolda zayıfların kaderi, diğerleri için aracı olmaktır. Bu fedakârlığı kabul ederek yüreğinde pişmanlık olmadan yaşamını sürdür."
languages.original_text: "Your ambition was worth the risk, you were simply unlucky with your students. The weak are destined to be stepping stones for others on the path to knowledge — accept this sacrifice and live without regret."
